name: afastidioushat
text: I'm sayin' issues, man. Beef is from circumstances, though. He's got pride on the line to hold his shit down. Ain't no complainer gonna rain down on Beef's rained out parade. I'm sayin'.

name: mr_pete
text: Which is why a dude holds down the complaints. The stranger you talk to may have his own Circumstances and not care for yours.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
it is something i say:

'be careful what you say. everyone is fighting a battle you know nothing about'

name: jrpigman
text: The cat initially listens to the fish because the fish also seems to be from circumstances. This proves to be false.

name: deimosrising
text: I resent the implication that only idiots get deported unintentionally. It happens to felons too.

name: molesticide
text: A comment left by molesticide was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by trisha, _cheesekayke, deovalente)

name: gouldgonewild
text: how dare you say  you like something. People will lame you for that

name: deancain29
text: Ive met guys like Barry - you've gotta be firm from the get go

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Usually that involves telling them firmly to go away.

name: steerpike66
text: Another Beef realization. Like the bead shop. "Oh my God, this is a Boring Place!"

name: stuart
text:
Damn you for posting what I was thinking

Stop stealing my brain thoughts

name: plezure
text: Fish drink Fish Tale beer.

name: yingkaixing
text: Nice try with the html.

name: heccibiggs
text: I love the absolute contempt implied by your avatar.

name: peterjoel
text: Barry's entire body is about the same size as the beer he is drinking. Also, I fucking hate that guy.

name: srennick
text: I have met such men as Barry.  They are always tiresome, and they search for passive, quiet men (like Beef) to inflict themselves upon.

name: rowboat
text: All this is true, but I must say that there's something about a conversation in which I'm not expected to reciprocate that is undeniably alluring to me. I don't seek out such exchanges, but I know how to deal with them when they find me. This is valuable.

name: spinynorman
text: 5 for the alt text.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Absolutely. That's what the INS should be all about. Deporting complaining,carping.....dicks.

name: echidnaboy
text: Barry Bass stuffs your ears with his thick bass steaks

name: songbirdspectre
text: I want to punch Barry Bass. He is a complainer.

name: zapatos
text: It'd be pretty great if Barry was eaten.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: and every time you took a bite, someone shot a dove.

name: greenkoolayd
text: they need to arrange that shit.  cats like fish, right?

name: ctrl_z
text: I know how you feel Beef, I know how you feel

name: diggidy
text: I love the juxtaposition between the alt text in this comic and the previous one.  "BARRY BASS is a bass worthy of your attention" followed immediately by "Barry Bass is such an idiot that he accidentally got deported"

name: canusdivinus
text:
That slow realization as to the character of your new friend... oh what a familiar feeling.

Oh my god
Eric's a laugher
Maybe I could make his death look like an accident

name: erutangis
text: I laughed at Barry Bass working in a purse factory, because a purse is the egg sac of a shark or stingray. I have to wonder if this was an intentional marine biology joke?

name: gouldgonewild
text: I like watching Hobbes ponder this

name: johnnybaverage
text: I enjoy Keyboard-head Strong Bad's enthusiasm about it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: yes, all over this vicinity.

name: gunsofray
text: i love how, in the browser history this is titled as "CHINA ... NEEEEDS .. COUCHES" but that doesnrt have anything to do with the strip at all .. unless China had a couch shortage in January 2004

name: hateandwar
text: Were you recently looking at that strip where the couch goes to China?

name: gunsofray
text: Nope.. not that i recall. In fact i think it was months ago when i read that strip..

name: shutup_shutup
text: Barry is what Anton LaVey would have called a "psychic vampire."  That was my favorite chapter in the Satanic Bible.

name: serious_man
text: garry likes buinness
